N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 178.8 - Requirements for parents of youth who will participate in a day placement program

State Regulations
(a) Prior
to assignment to a day placement program, where a youth is to reside with a
parent, the parent shall: (1)
receive a verbal
and written explanation of the nature of the day placement program and its
requirements; (2)
consent in
writing to participate in the program as required by the director; and
(3)
consent in writing to the
conditions of participation. (b) The parent may withdraw their consent at
any time during the day placement program by notifying the program director in
writing of such withdrawal. (c) Where a parent withdraws consent to a day placement program, the director may
either modify or terminate the youth's participation in the day placement
program. Notes
